data.name: Tomb Raider: Demolition Skin
data.detailed_description: Outfit Lara with the Demolition Gear, featuring an engineering jumpsuit and belt pack (single player outfit).
data.about_the_game: Outfit Lara with the Demolition Gear, featuring an engineering jumpsuit and belt pack (single player outfit).
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Korean, Spanish*, Traditional Chinese, Russian*, Polish*, Dutch, Czech, Portuguese-Brazil, Arabic*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP Service Pack 3, Windows Vista,7,8 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor:Dual core CPU: AMD Athlon64 X2 2.1 Ghz (4050+), Intel Core2 Duo 1.86 Ghz (E6300)
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9 graphics card with 512Mb Video RAM: AMD Radeon HD 2600 XT, nVidia 8600
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8
  • Processor:Quad core CPU: AMD Phenom II X4 955, Intel Core i5-750
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 11 graphics card with 1GB Video RAM: AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 480
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP Service Pack 3, Windows Vista,7,8 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor:Dual core CPU: AMD Athlon64 X2 2.1 Ghz (4050+), Intel Core2 Duo 1.86 Ghz (E6300)
  • Memory:1GB Memory (2GB on Vista)

  • Graphics:DirectX 9 graphics card with 512Mb Video RAM: AMD Radeon HD 2600 XT, nVidia 8600
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8
  • Processor:Quad core CPU: AMD Phenom II X4 955, Intel Core i5-750
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 11 graphics card with 1GB Video RAM: AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 480
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor:Intel i3 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory:4GB Memory
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 640 with 1GB of Video Memory (Driver version 364.12 tested), AMD R7 260X (Driver version MESA 11.2 tested).
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor:Intel i5
  • Memory:8GB Memory
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 760 with 3GB of Video Memory, (Driver version 364.12 tested)
